participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and introspective, with a deep love for animals and nature.
participant_1.background: i am an animal activist. the holidays make me depressed. my age is too old to say. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Energetic and supportive, enjoys mentoring young athletes and cherishing family moments.
participant_2.background: i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.
